24, 1957
We have begun a Workshop in Radio and in Television here as a
regular part of our course in Speech and Sacred Eloquence. So we would
like information as to membership in your Association. What are the
requirements for membership? What are the privileges and benefits?
Your help will be greatly appreciated!
